Notes: A swing that the player can swing across by grabbing onto it. The player can jump off  it at any given time. scale_y specifies the length of the swing.

Obj_arg0.Name: Additional Shadow Length
Obj_arg0.Description: How much to add to the shadow's length. Default is 1000.

Obj_arg1.Name: Shadow Cut Length
Obj_arg1.Description: How much to subtract from the shadow's length. Default is 0.

Camera.Description: Used when climbing on and swinging on the swing.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
